Hotel Detail

Hotel Granvia Osaka agoda

General Info

3-1-1 Umeda Kita-ku, Umeda, Osaka, Japan agoda

This impressive looking hotel is situated next to the Osaka Station and is ideal for guests looking to discover the sights and sounds of the city. The hotel is within easy reach of several modes of transportation including the subway station, local shopping centers, and markets. There are complimentary shuttle buses that transfer guests to the nearby Universal

Policies Info
